attributes.action: Debate The Reinstatement of National Service
attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to ask for a debate on the reinstatement of National Service for all persons who choose not to pursue Higher or Further Education, upon leaving school.

The period of time is also debatable, however I believe it should be 2 years minimum and 4 yrs maximum.

This would in no doubt provide the youth of a broken society direction and an education that can not be provided in a classroom.
